generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and crosswalks, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk visible on the right side of the road, where a person is walking, and it is separated from the road by a curb.
- building: A large, ornate building with classical architecture is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the road and in the background, providing greenery.
- terrain: Grass areas are visible along the roadside and in front of the building.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as a clear, open sky.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the side, including one directly in front of the camera.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, showing a red light.
- traffic sign: A triangular traffic sign with a black cross is visible on the left side of the image, indicating a priority road or a crossroad.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting the traffic light and traffic signs.
- fence: A fence is visible along the sidewalk on the right side of the image, separating the sidewalk from the building.
